title: Does the recent image of the black hole disprove Chapline's theory that black holes are actually dark energy stars? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, it does. It also disproves countless other nonsense ideas about black holes put forward by idiots who know nothing, including the idea that black holes do not exist.
As Andy Briggs says, the image disposes of many rival theories. What we’ve seen so far, exactly matches what theorists had predicted on the basis of General Relativity.
There is NO recent image of a black hole. Black holes can NOT be imaged, at all, ever.
